abstract: Ken Jaworowski reviews one-man show My Name Is Gideon: I'm Probably Going to Die, Eventually, written by and starring Gideon Irving, at Rattlestick Playwrights Theater.

keywords.value: My Name Is Gideon: I'm Probably Going to Die, Eventually (Play)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: Gideon Irving, who has performed in hundreds of homes in six countries, brings his one-man show of songs, jokes and surprises to Rattlestick Playwrights Theater.
snippet: Gideon Irving, who has performed in hundreds of homes in six countries, brings his one-man show of songs, jokes and surprises to Rattlestick Playwrights Theater....

headline.main: Review: ‘My Name Is Gideon: I’m Probably Going to Die, Eventually’
headline.print_headline: A Wacky Introduction to One Mischievous Fellow
